description:
The Whole Cake Chateau starts crumbling while everyone is trying to escape for their lives! Luffy and the others get away and move on to the next stage of their escape which involves some parting of ways. Meanwhile, Big Mom’s children notice their mother’s change of behavior at the worst possible moment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chateau Houkai: Mugiwara Ichimi Dai Dassou Start!
Das Château bricht zusammen – Die große Flucht der Strohhüte beginnt!
Il castello crolla! Inizia la grande fuga della ciurma di Cappello di paglia!
Le château s`effondre. La fuite des Mugiwara commence !
The Chateau Collapses! The Straw Hat`s Great Escape Begins!
¡El castillo se derrumba! ¡Comienza el gran escape del sombrero de paja!
Замок падает! Начинается великий побег Мугивар!
ينهار القصر! يبدأ هروب قبّعة القشّ العظيم!
巨城[シャトー]崩壊 麦わら一味大脱走開始[スタート]!
